fields_of_interest: Energy, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and innovation, Digital economy and society, Borders and Security, Communication
eu_initiatives: Consultation with the EU Commission/DG CONNECT regarding inter alia the European Agenda on Security, more specifically the Security Union Initiative, following the Commissions presentation on new measures to better protect EU citizens. This includes the possible future harmonizing measures regarding spectrum for PPDR Broad Band mobile networks across the Union.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
In areas where we are interested in, the relevant associations include:  
 
Digital Europe 
European Telecommunications Standards Institute (ETSI) 
Federal Association for Information Technology (Bitkom) 
International Telecommunications Union (ITU) 
TETRA Critical Communications Association (TCCA) 
Public Safety Communications Europe (PSCE)
relevant_communication: We participated in several Commission workshops on spectrum for 5G and the relations to PPDR initiatives in 700 MHz across Member States.
